descriptionHtml:
[b]DESCRIPTION:
[/b]
This mod is replacer of hands for UNP body.
I changed the topology and geometry. Now models use more polygons. They have the correct anatomical structure as well. Palms, fingers and wrists are reduced (as possible). I tried to keep max compatibility with vanilla texture, so you can use any texture, created for UNP.

[b]What's in Mod:[/b]

1) Hands replacer for the 1st and 3rd person;
2) Optional esp-file, add an elegant manicure. It uses 60 (unnamed) or 39 (shield) slot, choose an option. It can be crafted in the smithy, in the section of jewelry. Use with an optional handstexture;
3) Optional handstexture with smaller nails (I used SG Female Textures for base);

[b]INSTALLATION:
[/b]
- Manually copy & paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

[b][OPTIONAL]
[/b]
- Manually copy & paste the Hands Textures\Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
- Manually copy & paste the Nails\39 slot\Data folder to your Skyrim folder
[b]OR[/b]
- Manually copy & paste the Nails\60 slot\Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

[b]Thanks for:
[/b]
● DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709);
● SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267);
● BETA tester Karter.

● Please do not upload this files anywhere without my permission.
● If you want to use my files in your own mod, credit me.
author: Hidanna
